summary: This appears to be a search result or summary from the NYPD FINES system, listing two summons/ticket events involving Jeffrey Epstein. The first is a non-commercial parking violation from 2013, and the second is a more serious 'NO PARKING (NON-COM) SOMU' violation from 2010 where Epstein is listed as the perpetrator.

persons.name: Jeffrey Epstein
persons.context: Listed as the person receiving a parking summons in 2013 and as the perpetrator (PERP) for a 'NO PARKING (NON-COM) SOMU' violation in 2010.

events.title: Epstein receives parking summons
events.description: Jeffrey Epstein received a summons (Event Type: A-SUMMONS) for a parking violation in New York City.

events.title: Epstein cited for 'NO PARKING (NON-COM) SOMU' violation
events.description: Jeffrey Epstein is listed as the perpetrator (PERP) for a 'NO PARKING (NON-COM) SOMU' violation. The specific nature of 'SOMU' is not defined in the provided text.

keyFacts: The document is a record from the NYPD FINES system, searched on December 10, 2018.
It shows Jeffrey Epstein received a parking summons in New York City on April 25, 2013.
It shows Jeffrey Epstein was listed as the perpetrator for a 'NO PARKING (NON-COM) SOMU' violation on April 15, 2010.
The document indicates there were 2 total records found in the search, with 1 record not geocoded.
